sentences.english: Bedding is not provided, so bring a sleeping bag.
sentences.chinese: 不提供卧具，所以得自备睡袋。

sentences.english: He had nestled down in the sleeping-bag when I came back.
sentences.chinese: 我回来的时候，他已经舒舒服服地睡在了睡袋里面。

sentences.english: Waterproof jacket that transforms into a one person sleeping bag.
sentences.chinese: 这是一件防水夹克，可以变身为单人睡袋哦。

sentences.english: We had just started to curl up in our sleeping bags when we both heard a loud crack.
sentences.chinese: 我们正要钻进睡袋休息，忽然听到一声很大的噼啪声。

sentences.english: I mentioned the Mont Nitro bags in the main Sleeping Bag section.
sentences.chinese: 我刚才提到蒙特塞拉特硝基袋，在主要睡袋节。

sentences.english: Travelling in the jungle forest , people often sleep in the sleeping bag.
sentences.chinese: 在热带丛林中旅行时，人们经常睡在睡袋中。

sentences.english: Organizers are also stockpiling sleeping bags and long underwear.
sentences.chinese: 组织者还储备了睡袋和保暖内衣。

sentences.english: We stomp the snow into semiflatness and zip into our sleeping bags.
sentences.chinese: 我们把雪地踩成半坡状，并挤入睡袋。

sentences.english: Michael just bought a new tent and sleeping bags for the family camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 麦可刚为全家的露营之旅，买了新帐棚和睡袋。

sentences.english: I factory is specializing in the production of a sleeping bag and tent factories.
sentences.chinese: 我厂是一间专业生产睡袋与帐蓬的工厂。

sentences.english: Hundreds are camped out in the square wrapped in sleeping bags or blankets.
sentences.chinese: 无数的人在广场上露营，蜷局在睡袋和毯子里。

sentences.english: We roll out our sleeping bags in a little grassy swale among the boulders.
sentences.chinese: 我们在砾石间的草洼地上展开睡袋。

sentences.english: How do you know I had anot sleeping bag?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么知道我还有一个睡袋的？

sentences.english: When I go camping, I sleep in a sleeping bag.
sentences.chinese: 当我去野营的时候，我睡在睡袋里。

sentences.english: A few with sleeping bags curling up inside.
sentences.chinese: 有些人带了睡袋，就蜷缩在里面。

sentences.english: We carry the tent, sleeping bags, clothes, food and water with us in our backpacks.
sentences.chinese: 我们在背包里带了帐篷，睡袋，衣服，食物和水。
